input.sentences: we took the kids out to enjoy the holidays
first the got to eat some fruits .
then we took them to the park to play
after they got to show off their clovers
it was a great day with the kids .
output.sentences: When the holidays come around, our kids enjoy playing outside.
We always pack fruit for them to eat.
They love playing at the park.
Some of them try to find clovers.
Over all it has been a great day with the kids.
